summary: PBS is an American TV network that provides free, educational programs to public television stations across the U.S. It's like a big library of shows for everyone, including *Frontline*, *Sesame Street*, and *Masterpiece*. PBS gets its money from different places, like member stations, special groups, and donations. This helps keep the shows running without any one group having too much control. PBS has over 350 TV stations, many of which are run by schools, nonprofits, or state governments.
title: PBS
